commentBody:
I've been a Jets fan since my very first game , watching Bruce Harper scampering up and down the field at Shea stadium . I'd never seen a game before and I didn't know any of the rules . BTW that day the opposition was the Bills as well !
Fan for life , and I'll come to NY every chance I get during the season . These days we get live streaming in Sydney thru NFL Game pass .
Todd and Team , all the best for next season .
